title: Wallstreet2023
author: Wallstreet2023
content: Hi, Im experinced trader about 7 years.I trade btc and altcoins.I Do Market analysis what i see today.I see btc support zone 20,200-20,500$ lowest.But the Market can bounce from here.My btc target would be 22,200.Coins what Im watching today ? Matic,Sand,Sol Im bullish about them.I think matic 1.50 and sand can go over 1$ Im also very interested about macro economics and markets generally im FED WATCHER  Im checking daily reverse repo data and all that kind of things

comments.author: Bitum
comments.body: It would be much better instead of writing something like that if you could show your results in trading. You could impress us with that.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 07, 2022, 09:21:14 AMHi, Im experinced trader about 7 years.I trade btc and altcoins.7 years? No shit. Where is the information to back up your claim? Do you have a tradingview profile?QuoteI see btc support zone 20,200-20,500$ lowest.But the Market can bounce from here.My btc target would be 22,200.This would be better represented in chart, just like most traders do, otherwise we can't tell how you came with the support level

comments.author: Scripture
comments.body: Are you planning to offer services here or just want to share your experience in trading and your analysis?Many will not believe on you easily here, we need proof and of course we need to confirm your analysis if its correct or not.Better to share some analysis here, the way you plot your indicators and probably you might get the attention of many trader here.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: What do you mean by mentioning as a trader who has 7 years of experience? whether to make people believe that predictions are accurate, and the predictions you mention are easy to make even for novice traders because they don't include chart analysis and so onwithout proof then all your claims have no meaning.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Just prove that you're an experienced trader by giving valid points as to why you think that will be the support, etc. and the same goes for the altcoins that you've mentioned.It's not too much to ask but you're the one given the idea and described yourself as having experience. So, that's why if you don't mind, we're asking for some proof or more detailed explanations for the analysis that you've made.Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 07, 2022, 09:21:14 AMMy btc target would be 22,200.Does that mean you'll sell when it reaches $22,200? Unlike most of us here, we're mostly holding and waiting for the next bull run.

comments.author: Wallstreet2023
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on November 07, 2022, 11:16:24 PMJust prove that you're an experienced trader by giving valid points as to why you think that will be the support, etc. and the same goes for the altcoins that you've mentioned.It's not too much to ask but you're the one given the idea and described yourself as having experience. So, that's why if you don't mind, we're asking for some proof or more detailed explanations for the analysis that you've made.Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 07, 2022, 09:21:14 AMMy btc target would be 22,200.Does that mean you'll sell when it reaches $22,200? Unlike most of us here, we're mostly holding and waiting for the next bull run.No this there would be no bull run just many fake outs.But today btc can reach to 22k price range yes.My lowest price for btc 2022-2023 would be 14,000$ But today my coins Im Long position matic,sand,SOL since ftt crashed well i know it was just fud to get weak hands out of the ftt Im very bullish about ftt.

comments.author: Danydee72
comments.body: An experienced trader knows quite well, traders like to see some fundamentals.  What happens and why it should happen.So, if you like to take us with you, I would like to hear some more information. Why do you intend to sell BTC at 22'200? Do you see a crash coming? On the other hand BTC will not fall below 14k. For me that's the range to invest. It's not so important on the long run, if BTC is 19k, 22k or even touches 14k.

comments.author: Wallstreet2023
comments.created_time: November 08, 2022, 08:36:11 AMLast edit: November 08, 2022, 11:46:20 PM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: Scripture on November 07, 2022, 10:36:41 PMAre you planning to offer services here or just want to share your experience in trading and your analysis?Many will not believe on you easily here, we need proof and of course we need to confirm your analysis if its correct or not.Better to share some analysis here, the way you plot your indicators and probably you might get the attention of many trader here. Right now Im just showing u be the judge of my analysis.Off course you can always support with donations so i can work Even harder to be more motivated to produce better info and analysis about markets.Im in to team work and who knows what could be the outcome of that Quote from: Danydee72 on November 08, 2022, 08:10:50 AMAn experienced trader knows quite well, traders like to see some fundamentals.  What happens and why it should happen.So, if you like to take us with you, I would like to hear some more information. Why do you intend to sell BTC at 22'200? Do you see a crash coming? On the other hand BTC will not fall below 14k. For me that's the range to invest. It's not so important on the long run, if BTC is 19k, 22k or even touches 14k. This year we gona stay in 18-19k price range lowest there is a lot support this price zone.but today i see a lot support until 22k price range,definately i see ALTCOIN rally coming.If you entry in long position with 3x leverage you most definately will make profit with very low risk.But instead of futures i use bull bear leverage tokens If price going down i'll just dca more leverage tokens i prefer lev tokens instead of futures becouse no liqutation risk.If i have bull Lev tokens then i'll buy 2-3% per each token opposite direction leverage tokens just in case the Market goes another way then i'm insured against losses.This year i have the plan how to make profit when btc Are low i dca bull leverage tokens at price range 17k-20,500$ Once btc reach over 20,800$ to 21,500$ i sell bull tokens and i'll start buying bear tokens.  This year 2022 my highest target are 22,500$ and lowest Are 19k price range If i follow this i make profit most definately and sometimes i entry with 10x-30x leverage like i do it today becouse btc are in my low plan price zone today wich is 19k. I try to avoid trading when market are in between low and high like 20k price range then i would take 50% long and 50% short positions.I do also the oil gold and other market analysis not just the btc.Btw...Im interested about global macro economics and I been learning about fed markets and banking.(everthing self-learning)Our society don't ask what knowledge and skills you have they just want you to have education and paper that's why Im not working at wall street or in financial sector,so i trade myself my small funds just for now my own funds

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 08, 2022, 08:36:11 AMRight now Im just showing u be the judge of my analysis.Off course you can always support with donations so i can work Even harder to be more motivated to produce better info and analysis about markets....Before asking for a donation, you need to provide more information about yourself and your achievements in the cryptocurrency market. Show your profile on social networks in which you demonstrate your results of successful trading, because what you call analysis, in fact, it is not.

Unlike most of us here, we're mostly holding and waiting for the next bull run.No this there would be no bull run just many fake outs.But today btc can reach to 22k price range yes.My lowest price for btc 2022-2023 would be 14,000$ But today my coins Im Long position matic,sand,SOL since ftt crashed well i know it was just fud to get weak hands out of the ftt Im very bullish about ftt.Good luck if you're bullish with FTT, yes, this usually happens for the market to be shaken and this is being done by one of the giants in the market. But I guess that CZ has just learned his lesson from the fiasco that he has met with Luna and UST so, he's just doing everything he can to avoid the same scenario that has happened before. And about the pricing of bitcoin, it's the same from most analysis that I've heard that the bottom maybe in between of $10k-$20k.

comments.author: Wallstreet2023
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on November 08, 2022, 12:06:08 PMQuote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 08, 2022, 08:36:11 AMRight now Im just showing u be the judge of my analysis.Off course you can always support with donations so i can work Even harder to be more motivated to produce better info and analysis about markets....Before asking for a donation, you need to provide more information about yourself and your achievements in the cryptocurrency market. Show your profile on social networks in which you demonstrate your results of successful trading, because what you call analysis, in fact, it is not.Most important are that i know about markets.Maybe you don't need my knowledge and expertise but Im sure there a lot people out there who's interested.Im not offering any service here, Im here for long term cooperation If there is any possibility for any partnership at all but only time Will tell that Im also. Interested to meet with other my type of people who are interested about markets and who knows maybe we can work out something together or Even learn from each other something becouse we all know different things.My good strongest side is that i know about btc i can analyse btc price very well and Im so confident about my analysis about btc price i trust my own btc analysis way more then i trust well known traders and btc price analytics.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 07, 2022, 09:21:14 AM...I see btc support zone 20,200-20,500$ lowest...Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 08, 2022, 04:42:57 PMMost important are that i know about markets...My good strongest side is that i know about btc i can analyse btc price very well and Im so confident about my analysis about btc price i trust my own btc analysis way more then i trust well known traders and btc price analytics.These are just words) You have already shown the level of your competence in your first message, indicating that bitcoin cannot fall below $20200-20500. And 1 day after your forecast, the BTC price dropped to $19200 - this is a good demonstration of your analytical abilities.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: Wallstreet2023 on November 08, 2022, 08:36:11 AMRight now Im just showing u be the judge of my analysis.Off course you can always support with donations so i can work Even harder to be more motivated to produce better info and analysis about markets.Im in to team work and who knows what could be the outcome of that I don't know what would be your biggest advantage here other than wasting time on efforts that not many people like. If you are really able to analyze the market and bitcoin price well, then you shouldn't have to waste time just expecting donations from those you teach. Sorry if this sounds harsh, but I'm not sure your attempt was successful.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Lmao, Whata joke coming from a self proclaimed experienced trader with 7 years of trading experience. You created this thread right after CZ announced of selling of there FTT tokens and you are still bullish despite this bullish red flag news on crypto space?Binance and FTX controls the majority of crypto volume and hurting each other means they are dumping the whole market since they have spread assetin different altcoin that needs to be liquidate to pressure the token price of the other token. Yes it already reverse bounce on the price point that you mention. Good job on predicting the opposite result.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: The idea of patronage became a bit more popular these days in the world. It was something centuries ago but after a while industrial age ruined that and we took a few centuries break to it.The last 10 years with places such as patron, the idea of "I am doing this, this is my work, give me more money to keep doing what I do, or I may quit and nobody will have it" type of idea became more popular. This is of course not a bad thing, actually an amazing thing, only if people are willing to actually do something great for it. If it is like him and have no analysis and not really something worthy of donating, then it will not work, but I hope he gets better and better at it too.
